please_add_testament: please add a testament to see your link
writeHere_first_last_name: Write first and last name here
Name: Name
would you like to delete your testament: would you like to delete your testament
warning_public: Be cautious, in this mode, anyone can view your testament without permission, and no one can vote
warning_likes_users: Please specify the number of voters for your testament. If the designated number of people vote, they will all be able to view your testament. Choose the number of voters carefully
number_user: Select the number of friends who will vote.
select_friends: Please select the number of friends
warning_special_friends: Whether your loyal friend has an account in this application or not, write their full name (first and last name) and add any email address you want along with a password. You are not creating an account for your friend here, but your friend will provide these details (name, email, and password) to be able to vote after your passing.
select_witness: Please write the email address, names of friends, and a password of your choice here.
select_receive_witness: Please write down some of the names of your chosen special friends above, so that they can view your testament . Important note: Write down the first and last name
change_image_question: would you like to change your picture?
description_delete_testament: would you like to delete your testament?
description_upload_image: would you like to upload your picture?
error_set_admin: just admin can be set an admin

success_change_password: The password has been successfully changed
description_meta_app: A website that helps you easily write your will. Write your will, plan your inheritance, organize your finances, and determine the fate of your assets using our advanced tools. Create your will before it's too late. Inheritance, will power of attorney, inheritance execution, will, legacy, fear of death.
